Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide School Board Proposition -- 9.48 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of St. Helena, State of Louisiana, continue to levy a special tax of nine and forty-eight hundredths (9.48) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish of St. Helena, State of Louisiana (an estimated $500,600 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of supporting and maintaining the buildings of the St. Helena Parish School System, said tax to be a renewal of a tax approved at an election held on April 6, 2013, which tax expires with the 2023 levy?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide School District Proposition -- 16.40 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of St. Helena, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a tax of sixteen and forty hundredths (16.40) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $866,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of providing funding for the payment of salaries and benefits of certified and non-certified employees of the Parish School Board, said tax to be a renewal of a tax approved at an election held on November 6, 2012, which tax expires with the 2023 levy?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 1 of 2 -- 5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition No. 1 of 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall St. Helena Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a five (5) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033 (an estimated $264,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of maintaining and supporting the District, including the maintenance, operation, renovation and/or expansion of the St. Helena Parish Hospital Building?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 2 of 2 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition No. 2 of 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall St. Helena Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2025 and ending with the year 2034 (an estimated $528,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of rendering care to the sick and injured and promoting health by improving, maintaining and operating the nursing home in the District?
